info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 10:44PM EDT until March 24 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM WEDNESDAY TO NOON EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Freezing rain accumulations around a tenth of an inch, with up to a quarter inch possible over the southern Green Mountains in southern Vermont. Very light snow accumulations possible over southern Vermont. * WHERE...The southern Green Mountains and Connecticut River Valley in southern Vermont, Berkshires and northern Litchfield Hills in western Massachusetts and northwest Connecticut. * WHEN...From 11 PM Wednesday to noon EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance for icing will be on untreated surfaces early Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
